title: The entertainment of the high and mighty monarch Charles King of Great Britaine, France, and Ireland, into his auncient and royall city of Edinburgh, the fifteenth of Iune, 1633
author: Drummond, William, 1585-1649.
notes: The verses, though not the rest of the description, are attributed to William Drummond.
"A panegyricke to the high and mighty monarch Charles" by Walter Forbes, previously printed separately (STC 11151.5), p. 31-36.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
